name: Kids Coloring Book - Free 250+ Kids Coloring Pages
description: Kids Coloring Book is a free Coloring book for kids with 250+ Coloring Pages including 10+ categories for kids to learn while coloring and painting   Let your kids explore their creative side with kids coloring books using different brushes, crayons, colors, stickers and art styles. Learn different categories by painting.  Kids Coloring Book is fun learning that can keep your kid busy for hours with creative content, colorful experience and learn while playing and drawing with colors.  Coloring Pages are easy to color and colors does not overlap helping kids to create creative content the fun way. Also Kids can draw on blank pages to create new drawing and paint them.  Kids Coloring book is completely Free and all coloring pages are available to be explored by artist in your kids.  Kids Coloring pages are categorized into collections of:  Alphabets (A-Z)  Numbers (1-10)  Animals   Vegetables   Flowers   Prince and Princess  Shapes  Vehicles  Fruit  Christmas  Water Animals  Food  Greetings  Selfie and make funny faces to color fun things.  Features:   250+ Coloring Pages  100% FREE Coloring/Drawing Content  Supported languages like English  Simple and Attractive designs for Kids  Parental Lock  Different sizes of pencil and colors  50 adorable stickers  Zoom Color tool  Eraser tool  Clear All Color tool  Save the colored pages to the gallery  There is a premium option to remove ads from the application to provide the best experience for your kid. This enables a wholesome experience as the advertisements can be distracting to kids from the fun and coloring.  Please rate our kids drawing and painting application and leave a comment with your valued feedback.  Happy Coloring, Kids!!!  If you like our effort please show us your love by leaving a comment and rate our app.Please check our other apps too @ https://play.google.com/store/search?q=kidzooly&c=apps We are all ears as always.
